name: Back In The Jungle
description:
Congratulations on winning the race but the real race has only just begun... 

Avoid the t-rex by reversing backwards from the Finish line to the Start line. If the t-rex catches you, if you hit 3 trees, or end up in deep water, the race is over. 

Reach the start line and you might beat the Best Time but can you even get that far?
